channel.title: Yeah i need help with item equip
channel.description: :mad: uhm ok so i seen da new client wit torso capes etc i been using it alot on servers and i decided i wanan use for mine, so it works perfect but, if i wield say d bow and 1 more it just removs it i could have anti sheild put on phat it removs it, kay im not the best of coder but can sum1 help me, if sum1 explains it easy i can give co-owner or a huge thanks, so all it is ,is when i equip 1 of them from that client it only alows 1 and the capes equip in the fist how can i fix it :confused: :| :confused: :eek: :mad:
